thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 42 of 227
thread.title: Kaylee Podulka
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Kaylee Podulka

author: Kaylee Podulka
title: Kaylee Podulka
text: This is our second time buying from Gardner-White. We couldn't be happier! From picking out our bedroom set to buying it and having it delivered and set up everything went quickly and smoothly. I couldn't ask for more and I absolutely love everything. Our salesman Steve went above and beyond. We did have one tiny little issue with a knob being bent but I was able to chat with Joe and he sent a new one out to me immediately. Thank you to everyone for making it a wonderful experience as always! You have a customer for life with me!
